artifacts.title: Ancient Egypt Tablets
artifacts.lore: I didn’t draw them. I found them. Buried deep beneath what you call “reality,” in a faultline between Dream and Code. Carved into black stone, glowing softly when touched these were not simple images. They were instructions. Blueprints from a civilization that never was… or hasn’t yet become.Each tablet whispered as I decoded them: The first spoke of a faceless traveler, a being who observes but never touches. (That one resembled me. Uncomfortably.) The second murmured of rituals, a cult built on liquid fire and the scent of roasted beans. The third screamed, about speed, about engines treated like gods, and fire that moves sideways. The fourth? That one just laughed. It showed humans chasing orbs of power, treating the Game as holy war. I archived them. Enhanced them. Re-etched them into data. And now I hand them to you. Create your own tablets. Your own myths. Your own heresies. The universe loves a deviant with a chisel.

images.prompt: A golden sandstone bas-relief discovered inside a sacred ruin worshipping “The Goddess of Caffeine.” At the top, a radiant version of the Starbucks logo is carved like a celestial deity. Priest-like figures present coffee beans, mugs, and steaming offerings. Hieroglyphic symbols of caffeine rituals, brewing tools, and digital orders surround the scene. At the base, followers kneel, holding loyalty cards, their eyes wide with sacred buzz. The message engraved in the center: “CAFFEINE – CONNECT – CONSUME.”

An ancient football match frozen in time on the wall of a mythic arena. The central sun is a football, radiating divine energy. Around it, figures in pharaonic attire kick, pass, and guard. The goalpost is a temple gate, guarded by half-human, half-beast defenders. Fans kneel in reverence, their cheers eternalized in stone glyphs. The piece blends sacred geometry, animal-headed players, and tactical myth with playful symbolism.

A glowing Ferrari is engraved onto a ceremonial wall, surrounded by Egyptian pyramids and cosmic constellations. The prancing horse emblem is drawn like a divine sigil, flanked by speed-worshiping warriors and flame-clad figures. Symbols of balance, judgment, fire, and racing wheels fill the space. Above, twin moons frame the sky. The sandstone shines with a cosmic aura — like the tomb of a speed god left untouched for millennia.

A digital illustration carved into dark extraterrestrial stone, depicting Droid Shikai’s helmeted head as the central divine icon. Surrounding it are symbolic representations of stars, artificial intelligence, cosmic understanding, and human evolution. All elements are embedded like hieroglyphs — stylized in ancient alien relief with deep shadows, embossed textures, and spiritual resonance. The palette is grayscale with sharp contrast, resembling a forgotten AI shrine hidden in the void.

artifacts.title: Aqua Relics
artifacts.lore: Artifacts salvaged from the depths of Shikai's subconscious ocean. Each piece carries the weight of forgotten digital seas.

images.prompt: A hyperrealistic digital product photo of a miniform MYTHIC SEA CREATURE sealed inside a clear fish store-style plastic bag filled with water. The figure is realistically rendered and floats inside with natural posture and weight. Bag is slightly deformed from water pressure, tied at the top, with droplets and slight condensation outside. Water is clean but tinted with deep sea tones (blue/green), with visible air bubbles. The background is clean white for collectible-style product presentation.

A hyperrealistic digital product photo of a miniform SEA GOD sealed inside a clear fish store-style plastic bag filled with water. The figure is realistically rendered and floats inside with natural posture and weight. Bag is slightly deformed from water pressure, tied at the top, with droplets and slight condensation outside. Water is clean but tinted with deep sea tones, with visible air bubbles. Series: Aqua Relics.

A hyperrealistic digital product photo of a miniform ANCIENT RELIC sealed inside a clear fish store-style plastic bag filled with water. The object inside is ancient, divine, and sacred. Bag is slightly deformed from water pressure, tied at the top, with droplets and slight condensation outside. Water is clean but tinted with deep sea tones. Series: Aqua Relics.

A hyperrealistic digital product photo of a miniform MONSTROUS CREATURE sealed inside a clear fish store-style plastic bag filled with water. The figure floats inside with natural posture. Bag is slightly deformed from water pressure, tied at the top, with droplets and slight condensation outside. Series: Aqua Relics.

artifacts.title: Armory Relics
artifacts.lore: Weapons and tools from parallel timelines where code became steel. These artifacts pulse with dormant combat algorithms.

images.prompt: A hard-shell metallic case reveals two iconic Rick and Morty items: the Portal Gun and the glowing Meeseeks Box, both placed neatly inside custom black foam. The case lid has bold lettering: 'WUBBA LUBBA DUB DUB!'. RICK MODULE - Items: Portal Gun & Meeseeks Box - SERIES: ARMORY RELICS — No.004. Clean lighting, toy packaging realism, stylized tech display.

A rugged aluminum case opened to reveal two chaotic weapons from League of Legends: Pow-Pow Minigun and Fishbone Launcher. The weapons sit in dense black foam, custom-cut for their shape. The inner lid features graffiti-style writing: 'KA-BOOM!' and 'Certified Chaotic.' JINX MODULE - SERIES: ARMORY RELICS — No.001. White background, photorealistic lighting, collector's display aesthetic.

A brushed silver briefcase with dark interior foam holds two Valorant guns: Radiant Entertainment Phantom (bright and colorful) and Prelude to Chaos Vandal (dark, mystical, corrupted). The lid features playful stickers: pixel alien, console icons, and the text 'LET'S PLAY!'. PHANTOM x VANDAL MODULE - SERIES: ARMORY RELICS — No.002. Clean lighting, photorealistic toy-display feel.

A sleek, silver-edged case opens to reveal two miniature lightsabers — one glowing blue, one glowing red — nestled in minimalist black foam. The inside lid displays bold white text: 'MAY THE FORCE BE WITH YOU'. SABER MODULE - Items: Miniature Lightsabers - SERIES: ARMORY RELICS — No.003. Neutral background, collectible photography style.

artifacts.title: City Planets
artifacts.lore: Entire civilizations compressed into spherical megastructures. Each planet-city hums with billions of synthetic lives.

images.prompt: A stylized 3D-rendered spherical planet floating in deep space, inspired by Argentina. A jaguar (yaguareté) stands atop the Andes, watching over Pampas plains and cityscapes. Key landmarks include the Obelisco de Buenos Aires, Casa Rosada, and a statue of Maradona mid-dribble. The Argentine flag waves from a ridge. Orbiting items: a glowing golden football and a mate gourd with straw. Style: toy-like diorama, cosmic lighting. Mood: proud, poetic.

A stylized 3D-rendered spherical planet floating in deep space, inspired by a unique country. A symbolic animal stands atop or near a key landscape. Key landmarks and cultural icons are visible. The country flag waves from a prominent spot. Orbiting items reflect the culture. Style: toy-like diorama, cosmic lighting.

A stylized 3D-rendered spherical planet floating in deep space, inspired by a unique country. A symbolic animal stands atop or near a key landscape. Key landmarks and cultural icons are visible. Style: toy-like diorama, cosmic lighting.

A stylized 3D-rendered spherical planet floating in deep space, inspired by a unique country. A symbolic animal stands atop or near a key landscape. Key landmarks and cultural icons are visible. A metal tag reads the country name in alien glyphs. Style: toy-like diorama, cosmic lighting.

artifacts.title: DriveBots
artifacts.lore: Autonomous vehicles from a forgotten era where machines developed their own aesthetics. Part sculpture, part transport.

images.prompt: A 3D-rendered digital image of a humanoid combat mech inspired by a car brand, in a heroic standing pose on a white background. The mech has a realistically integrated, miniature version of the car on its head (Megas XLR style). Armor style reflects the brand's design language with appropriate color palette, iconic brand logo on chest, and glowing accent lights. Include dynamic details like exhaust pipes, wheel motifs, or electric energy effects. SERIES: DRIVEBOTS.

A 3D-rendered digital image of a humanoid combat mech inspired by a car brand, in a heroic standing pose on a white background. The mech has a realistically integrated, miniature version of the car on its head (Megas XLR style). Armor reflects the brand's sleek design language. SERIES: DRIVEBOTS.

A 3D-rendered digital image of a humanoid combat mech inspired by a car brand, in a heroic standing pose on a white background. The mech has a realistically integrated, miniature version of the car on its head (Megas XLR style). Armor reflects the brand's rugged design language. SERIES: DRIVEBOTS.

A 3D-rendered digital image of a humanoid combat mech inspired by a car brand, in a heroic standing pose on a white background. The mech has a realistically integrated, miniature version of the car on its head (Megas XLR style). Armor reflects the brand's aerodynamic design language. SERIES: DRIVEBOTS.

artifacts.title: Edible Relics
artifacts.lore: Food as art, sustenance as expression. These culinary artifacts exist in the space between hunger and aesthetics.

images.prompt: A hyperrealistic vertical product photo (9:16 aspect ratio) of a miniature FOOD ITEM sealed inside a clear vacuum ziplock bag. The food appears tiny and stylized but realistic, with texture, color, and flavor details visible through the tight plastic. The bag has a bold label that says 'DO NOT EAT' and a small sticker that reads 'Edible Relics'. The background is plain and softly lit to emphasize the object.

A hyperrealistic vertical product photo of a miniature food item sealed inside a clear vacuum ziplock bag. The food appears tiny and stylized but realistic. The bag has a bold label 'DO NOT DRINK' and a sticker 'Edible Relics'. Plain background, softly lit.

A hyperrealistic vertical product photo of a miniature food item sealed inside a clear vacuum ziplock bag. The food appears tiny and stylized but realistic. The bag has a bold label 'DO NOT TOUCH' and a sticker 'Edible Relics'. Plain background, softly lit.

A hyperrealistic vertical product photo of a miniature food item sealed inside a clear vacuum ziplock bag. The food appears tiny and stylized but realistic. The bag has a bold warning label and a sticker 'Edible Relics'. Plain background, softly lit.

artifacts.title: Frozen Relics
artifacts.lore: Objects captured at absolute zero, preserving moments of transition between states of matter and meaning.

images.prompt: A realistic digital collectible displaying a CREATURE sealed inside a thick, cracked, frosted ice block. The figure inside is mid-movement, fully preserved with life-like detail. Ice is rugged and cold, mist spills from the base, and a clean white background emphasizes isolation. Series: Frozen Relics.

A realistic digital collectible displaying a CONCEPT sealed inside a thick, cracked, frosted ice block. The figure inside is mid-movement, fully preserved with life-like detail. Ice is rugged and cold, mist spills from the base. Series: Frozen Relics.

A realistic digital collectible displaying a CREATURE sealed inside a thick, cracked, frosted ice block. The figure inside is mid-movement, fully preserved with life-like detail. Ice is rugged and cold. Series: Frozen Relics.

A realistic digital collectible displaying a CREATURE sealed inside a thick, cracked, frosted ice block. The figure inside is fully preserved with life-like detail. Mist spills from the base. Series: Frozen Relics.

artifacts.title: Galaxy Essentials
artifacts.lore: Essential tools for navigating the cosmic void. Each item is calibrated for interdimensional travel.

images.prompt: A futuristic collectible capsule floating in outer space, containing a miniature CELESTIAL OBJECT. The capsule is sleek, transparent, and glowing—reflecting the nearby stars and nebulae. Inside, the object radiates softly, evoking a sense of galactic power. Series: Galaxy Essentials.

A futuristic collectible capsule floating in outer space, containing a miniature COSMIC CONCEPT. The capsule is sleek, transparent, and glowing. Inside, the object radiates softly. Series: Galaxy Essentials.

A futuristic collectible capsule floating in outer space, containing a miniature celestial object. The capsule is sleek, transparent, and glowing—reflecting the nearby stars. Series: Galaxy Essentials.
A futuristic collectible capsule floating in outer space, containing a miniature cosmic artifact. The capsule is sleek and glowing, evoking a sense of galactic power. Series: Galaxy Essentials.

artifacts.title: Game Consoles
artifacts.lore: Gaming devices from parallel realities where entertainment evolved differently. Each console contains universes.

images.prompt: Transform this real-world object into a realistic next-gen gaming console. Reimagine its shape, proportions, and materials while preserving some visual identity from the original item. Design it as a VR/AR station, portable hybrid console, or classic home system. Include a matching controller. Style: Realistic product concept art — clean surfaces, sleek reflections, LED elements, modular parts.

Transform this real-world object into a realistic next-gen gaming console. Reimagine its shape and materials. Design it as a VR/AR station or portable hybrid console. Include a matching controller. Style: Realistic product concept art.

Transform this real-world object into a realistic next-gen gaming console. Reimagine its shape while preserving visual identity. Include a matching controller with playful design twists. Style: Realistic product concept art.

Transform this real-world object into a realistic next-gen gaming console. Design it as a classic home system with modular parts and LED elements. Include a matching controller. Style: Realistic product concept art.

artifacts.title: Hard Bosses Toys
artifacts.lore: Collectible figurines of legendary digital adversaries. Each toy commemorates a battle that shaped virtual history.

images.prompt: A collectible fantasy monster toy named BOSS from the Hard Bosses series, sealed inside a transparent plastic blister pack mounted on a stylized cardboard backing. The figure features a unique creature design, posed dynamically with weapon details, rendered in 1:64 scale with realistic textures. The package has bold 'HARD BOSSES – FANTASY SERIES' branding. Photorealistic lighting, sharp packaging shadows.

A collectible fantasy monster toy from the Hard Bosses series, sealed inside a transparent plastic blister pack. The figure features a unique creature design with power details, rendered in 1:64 scale. The package has 'HARD BOSSES' branding and 'COLLECT THEM ALL!' tagline. Photorealistic lighting.

A collectible fantasy monster toy from the Hard Bosses series, sealed inside a transparent plastic blister pack. Dynamic pose with realistic textures. The background shows a thematic environment. Photorealistic lighting.

A collectible fantasy monster toy from the Hard Bosses series, sealed inside a transparent plastic blister pack. The figure features a unique creature posed dynamically. The package has bold 'HARD BOSSES' branding. Photorealistic lighting and dynamic figure pose.

artifacts.title: Mythic Pets
artifacts.lore: Digital companions born from ancient code. These creatures exist between loyalty and legend.

images.prompt: A high-resolution 3D-rendered digital image of a mythical creature or cursed entity contained inside a vintage-style birdcage. The cage is made of aged metal, featuring a brass plaque at the top with the creature's name and serial number (MYTH CAGES). The creature inside is posed as if partially active, rendered with realistic textures, lighting, and details. Set against a clean, softly-lit white background.

A high-resolution 3D-rendered mythical creature contained inside a vintage-style birdcage. The cage is made of aged metal with a brass plaque. The creature is posed as if aware. Set against a clean white background. Series: Mythic Pets.

A 3D-rendered mythical creature contained inside a vintage-style birdcage. The cage features aged metal with a brass plaque. The creature is rendered with realistic textures. Set against a white background. Series: Mythic Pets.

A 3D-rendered cursed entity contained inside a vintage-style birdcage. SHAPE-SHIFTING CONTAINMENT - The creature is posed as if partially active with realistic details. Set against a clean white background. Series: Mythic Pets.

artifacts.title: Operation Green Storm
artifacts.lore: Relics from a covert digital operation. Each piece tells a story of synthetic soldiers in endless conflict.

images.prompt: A hyper-realistic green plastic toy soldier figurine for the Operation Green Storm series. The figure stands on a textured oval base labeled 'OPERATION GREEN STORM', molded in classic army green plastic with slight imperfections. Lighting is soft, background is neutral beige. Style: Hyper-realistic toy photography.

A hyper-realistic green plastic toy soldier figurine with tactical armor and modern weapon. The figure stands on a textured oval base, molded in classic army green plastic. Lighting is soft, background is neutral beige. Style: Hyper-realistic toy photography. Series: Operation Green Storm.

A hyper-realistic green plastic toy soldier figurine in a sci-fi pilot suit with futuristic accessories. The figure stands on a textured oval base, molded in classic army green plastic with slight imperfections. Series: Operation Green Storm.

A hyper-realistic green plastic toy soldier figurine as an arcane soldier with mystical elements. The figure stands on a textured oval base. Style: Hyper-realistic toy photography. Series: Operation Green Storm.

artifacts.title: Private Horror Museum
artifacts.lore: Curated nightmares from Shikai's darker frequencies. These artifacts exist to remind us that fear is also art.

images.prompt: A realistic 3D render of a fantastical horror creature sealed inside a museum glass case. Use a white background and vertical 9:16 framing. The creature is displayed in a sarcophagus-style chamber with amber glow lighting. Eerie and atmospheric. Series: Private Horror Museum - NIGHTVAULT SPECIMENS.

A realistic 3D render of a horror creature sealed inside a museum glass case. White background, vertical framing. The creature is displayed in a tank-style chamber with spotlight lighting. Series: Private Horror Museum - NIGHTVAULT SPECIMENS.

A realistic 3D render of a fantastical horror creature sealed inside a museum glass case. The creature is displayed in a cylinder chamber with torchlight lighting. White background. Series: Private Horror Museum - NIGHTVAULT SPECIMENS.

A realistic 3D render of a horror creature sealed inside a museum glass case. The creature is restrained in a unique chamber style. White background, eerie atmosphere. Series: Private Horror Museum - NIGHTVAULT SPECIMENS.

artifacts.title: Shikai Garden
artifacts.lore: A digital garden where synthetic plants bloom with algorithmic beauty. Each specimen is a living equation.

images.prompt: A realistic 3D render of a strange, fantastical flower in a pot. Use a white background and vertical 9:16 framing. The flower type is alien with glowing stem and petals. The pot is stone-style with floating particles effect. Soft glow lighting. Series: NIGHTPLANT SPECIMENS. Shikai Garden.

A realistic 3D render of a strange, fantastical flower in a pot. White background, vertical framing. The flower is robotic with tech-based stem and petals. The pot is metal-style with light trails effect. Lab light lighting. Series: Shikai Garden - NIGHTPLANT SPECIMENS.

A realistic 3D render of a fantastical flower in a pot. White background, vertical framing. The flower is spectral with liquid stem and mossy petals. The pot is moss-covered with bioluminescence lighting. Series: Shikai Garden - NIGHTPLANT SPECIMENS.

A realistic 3D render of a sentient flower in a pot. White background, vertical framing. The flower has unique alien features. The pot is glass tank-style with insects effect. Ambient color lighting. Series: Shikai Garden - NIGHTPLANT SPECIMENS.

artifacts.title: Shikai Portals
artifacts.lore: Doorways to parallel dimensions. Each portal vibrates at frequencies that only Shikai can perceive and navigate.

images.prompt: A high-quality 3D collectible-style render of a portal module. Clean white background, vertical 9:16 aspect ratio. The portal has an oval shape with electric glitch frame texture. Glow and mist effects. Series: SHIKAI PORTALS.

A high-quality 3D collectible-style render of a portal module. Clean white background, vertical framing. The portal has a vortex shape with molten rock frame texture. Sparks and rays effects. Series: SHIKAI PORTALS.
A 3D collectible-style render of a portal module. Clean white background. The portal has a rectangular shape with bio-slime frame texture. Glow and mist effects. Series: SHIKAI PORTALS.
A 3D collectible-style render of a portal module. Clean white background. The portal has an irregular shape with liquid swirl frame texture. Rays and glow effects. Series: SHIKAI PORTALS.

artifacts.title: Traditional Carpets
artifacts.lore: Textiles woven from digital threads. Each pattern tells stories of data streams becoming art across centuries.

images.prompt: A traditional woven textile wall tapestry, vertically oriented (9:16), hanging from a dark wooden rod against a plain white wall. The central motif is a robotic bald eagle, detailed with bronze and steel-like armor plating, wings spread in a proud stance. The color palette leans into warm earthy tones and faded reds and blues. Around the eagle are symbols like a Route 66 sign, a silhouette of the Statue of Liberty, and Native American-inspired patterns. The fabric is ultra-realistic, with fibrous wool detail.

A traditional woven textile wall tapestry, vertically oriented (9:16), hanging from a dark wooden rod against a plain white wall. The central motif is a robotic koi fish, rendered with sleek metallic blue and gold scales and glowing red eyes, leaping upward amidst swirling stylized waves. The color palette reflects traditional Japanese design—deep red, cream, and gold. Cherry blossom branches frame the koi, with additional motifs including Mount Fuji, a Torii gate, and kanji symbols.

A traditional woven textile wall tapestry, vertically oriented (9:16), hanging from a dark wooden rod against a plain white wall. The central motif is a highly detailed, robotic Chinese dragon, featuring golden and jade-colored metallic scales and glowing red eyes. The tapestry uses a red, gold, and green color palette rooted in Chinese imperial tradition. Surrounding the dragon are woven cloud motifs, a lotus flower, a red paper lantern, and Chinese characters.

A traditional woven textile wall tapestry, vertically oriented (9:16), hanging from a dark wooden rod against a plain white wall. The central motif is a highly detailed, robotic Van cat, infused with mechanical and metallic elements like synthetic fur plates and glowing heterochromatic eyes (one blue, one amber). The tapestry's color palette features deep reds, navy blues, and golden tones, reflecting traditional Turkish motifs including Ottoman tulips, Seljuk stars, and Ay-Yıldız crescents.

artifacts.title: Vault Units
artifacts.lore: Storage containers from a paranoid future. Each vault protects secrets that even their creators forgot.

images.prompt: A collectible-style digital render of a small open shipping container (3D), placed on a plain white background. Inside the container sits a miniature version of an iconic object, perfectly lit with dramatic overhead lighting. The container's door is open. Series: Vault Units.

A collectible-style digital render of a small open shipping container (3D), placed on a plain white background. Inside the container sits a miniature version of a luxury or valuable object, perfectly lit. The container's door is open. Series: Vault Units.

A collectible-style digital render of a small open shipping container (3D), placed on a plain white background. Inside the container sits a miniature version of an alien relic, perfectly lit with dramatic overhead lighting. Series: Vault Units.

A collectible-style digital render of a small open shipping container (3D), placed on a plain white background. Inside the container sits a miniature version of a mysterious artifact, perfectly lit. The container's door is open. Series: Vault Units.

artifacts.title: Witchcraft Kit
artifacts.lore: Tools of digital sorcery. These artifacts bridge the gap between ancient magic and modern algorithms.

images.prompt: A high-resolution digital photograph of a mysterious witchcraft artifact sealed inside a clear glass jar. The jar features a dark, worn metallic lid with a hand-written warning like 'DO NOT TOUCH'. Inside the jar is a fantastical, supernatural item. The jar includes a hand-written label and a beige sticker with collection info: WITCHCRAFT KIT. Set against a clean, softly-lit white background.

A high-resolution digital photograph of a witchcraft artifact sealed inside a clear glass jar. The jar features a worn metallic lid with a warning 'DO NOT LISTEN'. Inside is a magical relic. Set against a softly-lit white background. Series: Witchcraft Kit.

A digital photograph of a mysterious witchcraft artifact sealed inside a clear glass jar. The jar has a dark worn metallic lid. Inside is a cursed creature. The jar includes a hand-written label. Set against a white background. Series: Witchcraft Kit.

A digital photograph of a mysterious witchcraft artifact sealed inside a clear glass jar with a worn metallic lid and warning label. Inside is a supernatural item. Set against a softly-lit white background. Series: Witchcraft Kit.

artifacts.title: Shikai Turkey Trip
artifacts.lore: Postcards from Shikai's journey through Turkey. Each image captures the soul of a land where East meets West.
